query:
SELECT lpm.*, lpt.title as topicTitle, lpm2.title as moduleTitle
FROM learningPathMaterials lpm
INNER JOIN learningPathTopics lpt ON lpm.topicId = lpt.id
INNER JOIN learningPathModules lpm2 ON lpt.moduleId = lpm2.id
LIMIT 20;

INNER JOIN learningPathTopics lpt ON lpm.topicId = lpt.id
INNER JOIN learningPathModules lpm2 ON lpt.moduleId = lpm2.id
